product_name: No7Pure Retinol Fragrance Free Eye Cream
summary: SummaryNo7 Pure Retinol Eye Cream contains pure retinol to help accelerate surface skin renewal. This retinol eye cream is formulated with Pure Retinol and a retinol optimizer encapsulation system that enhances pure retinol delivery. (Other claims based on consumer study of UK women over 8 weeks.)
details: DetailsBenefitsWith No7 Pure Retinol Eye Cream, deep wrinkles look visibly reducedAfter 2 weeks, wrinkles appear smoother, fine lines, crow's feet and puffiness look reduced* (*Consumer study of UK women)Pure Retinol eye cream works night after night to deliver visibly younger looking skin around the eyesNo7 eye cream is fragrance-freeItem 2586058How To UseFor best results: In the evening, dot around eyes and gently blend around the eye contours. If sensitivity occurs, reduce use to every other night and build up to nightly use.Pro tip: When using retinol, be sure to use a day cream with SPF every day. Retinol can sensitize skin to the sun's raysPrecautions: Contains retinol which may cause sensitivity. Please refer to leaflet for directions and warnings and ensure you read carefully before your first use. Note: When pregnant or breastfeeding it is recommended to avoid any products containing retinol.IngredientsAqua (Water/Eau), Glycerin, Butyrospermum parkii (Shea) butter, Dimethicone, Cetearyl alcohol, Alcohol denat., Butylene glycol, Polyacrylamide, Glyceryl stearate, Stearic acid, Palmitic acid, PEG-100 stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Boron nitride, C13-14 isoparaffin, Panthenol, Methylparaben, Caprylic/capric triglyceride, Laureth-7, Ethylparaben, Bisabolol, Polysorbate 20, Retinol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sorbitan laurate, Inulin lauryl carbamate, Sodium lauroyl lactylate, Carbomer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sucrose laurate, Behentrimonium chloride, Acetyl dipeptide-1 cetyl ester, Ceramide NP, Phytosphingosine, Ceramide AP, Cholesterol, Xanthan gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Benzoic acid, Palmitoyl tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl tetrapeptide-7, Ceramide EOP.
how_to_use: For best results: In the evening, dot around eyes and gently blend around the eye contours. If sensitivity occurs, reduce use to every other night and build up to nightly use.Pro tip: When using retinol, be sure to use a day cream with SPF every day. Retinol can sensitize skin to the sun's raysPrecautions: Contains retinol which may cause sensitivity. Please refer to leaflet for directions and warnings and ensure you read carefully before your first use. Note: When pregnant or breastfeeding it is recommended to avoid any products containing retinol.

reviews.headline: This eye cream is a must
reviews.comments: I just recently started to use No.7 skin care products.  Let me tell you, I am very impressed.  This is my most recent "newbie"‚Ä¶.and yes, I will definitely be permanently adding this to my skin care regimen.  It's a wonderful eye cream.  It feels cool and smooth as being applied.  It leaves my eye area  soft and wrinkle free.  I am 73 years old and have NO fine lines or crows feet.  I attribute this to a good skin care regimen, but this product takes it to another level.  I can actually feel and see an even better difference in my eye area.  I have purchased all of my No.7 products from Ulta, as I feel they have the best selection in store and online.  Another item you may want to try is the Restore and Renew Face & Neck Serum.  That was my very first No.7 purchase.  I'm on my 3rd tube‚Ä¶.and this is the product that sold me on No.7 products.

I would choose this product always
Less wrinkles
reviews.comments: If you use it consistently it works, I have less puffiness and my wrinkles have slightly diminished. Will repurchase again over the roc eye cream

reviews.comments: It gave me an allergic reaction. It made my eye swollen and red, I didn't even use everyday.

reviews.headline: I may buy this again
reviews.comments: To early to tell if it works

reviews.headline: Just purchased
reviews.comments: Have only used for a few days so don't know how it will work.

reviews.headline: I hated it‚Ä¶.
reviews.comments: I got chemical burns from this and I wasnt even using it every night. I normally dont have sensitive skin either.

reviews.headline: Good Eye creams are hard to find.
reviews.comments: I have tried at least a million or so it seems in my adult lifetime to find an eyecream that isn't too heavy on the skin around my eyes. I've always tried to pay attention to being careful applying it. So far I'm loving this and will certainly purchase it again.

reviews.headline: SUPERB!
reviews.comments: I've tried many products to hydrate the very dry skin on the outside section of my under eye area.  Nothing worked until I tried this eye cream.  It leaves the skin less wrinkly looking and feeling more hydrated!

reviews.headline: My Ride or Die
reviews.comments: No7 eye products seem to be what my skin likes the most and I've had nothing but great results with their eye line. I use the Pure Retinol in my night routine and No7 Vitamin C in my day routine. I still have expression lines, but only because I'm a very expressive person and didn't take care of my skin in my twenties. This doesn't bother me because I'm a human being, not a porcelain doll, and they're not deep. Results for me are found in compliments I'm given that I routinely look 5-7 years younger than I actually am, which puts me looking like I'm in my early 30's. That's a win for me! I've been using No7 for roughly 10 years and I'm very pleased with the results.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: I've only been using for five days and already see such a difference around my eyes

reviews.headline: Best eye cream I have used
Good
reviews.comments: I'm a night shift worker and tend to not always get the greatest sleep.  Often have puffy, tired, and dull looking eyes.  I swear this product has helped my eyes appear brighter and bags go down a bit.  It's not a huge difference, you can't expect a product to fix what bad sleep does to your eyes but it really does help a lot!  I often spend $15 tops on skincare products but I decided to try this and love it.  A little goes a long way.  For people that have had dry skin reactions, they probably are not used to retinol.  I use it often and my face had absolutely no reaction.  Most retinol products will give a reaction if you've never used it and just slather a bunch on your face.  You have to let your skin get used to it little by little but it's worth it.

reviews.headline: made my skin swell and turn red
reviews.comments: I have super sensitive skin and probably should not have tried this, but because it is fragrance-free I thought It might work. After using it sparingly, my skin swelled and turned red overnight. Took almost a week to calm down, skin peeled, it was a mess. It did say you may need to acclimate to it, but since my reaction was bad, I won't be using again.

reviews.headline: So smooth
reviews.comments: I am impressed at how well this eye cream goes on. With the eye area, you must be so careful not to press too hard or rub on creams because that's damaging to your delicate eye area. But this cream is smooth and saturating. I've never bought No7 eye cream before and with BYGO 40% this was a steal and my favorite eye cream so far.

reviews.headline: Allergic Reaction
reviews.comments: I don't have sensitive skin but this eye cream gave me an allergic reaction. Don't know what ingredient caused it but it made my eyes water and my skin itchy. I was also looking for a more emollient formula and this one is very thin and quick to dry.  Needless to say, I'm not a fan.

reviews.headline: This really works!
reviews.comments: As a shift worker getting off a month of night shifts, my under eye bags REALLY needed help. I stumbled across this one, and gave it a try. The fact that it's fragrance free was a huge selling point since I have very sensitive skin. After just one week of use, I've seen a huge reduction in under eye puffiness and discoloration and no skin irritation whatsoever. Highly recommend!

media.headline: No. 7 Pure Retinol Eye Cream Product Review
No.7 Pure Retinol Fragrance Free Eye Cream
No.7 Pure Retinol Fragrance Free Eye Cream

faceoff_positive.comments: This review is for No7 Pure Retinol Fragrance Free Eye Cream.  I used the product for 10-days.  I did not feel like it sat on my skin but actually absorbed into it.  Even through it has Retinol I did not find it irritating in any way. However, I did notice the skin near the inner corner of my eyes was starting to get just a tiny bit dry. (See pic).   In terms of the claim that it minimizes the look of dark circles & puffiness, I don't feel that I can back that up only because I have not used it long enough.   I have very dark circles and some puffiness but I did not notice improvement in either. But you also need to test a product for longer to determine if it helps in these areas (couple months for dark circles).  In terms of improving signs of ageing,  the bottom area of my eye area (just above the cheekbone) was starting to get lines due to smiling and the area just under the lower lashes and these are less noticeable since using this product.  My eye area feels moisturized. Overall, I like the product and it works well as an anti-ageing eye cream, aside from the noted inner eye area feeling a tiny bit dry.  I have used a lot of eye creams in my life and this one shows results quickly compared to others.  I did not think I would see any results within a 10-days use.  So, I would buy this product in the future and even recommend it to family and friends.
faceoff_positive.headline: Quick Results

faceoff_negative.comments: After trying the product, I'm sad to say I didn't notice much difference. I have found very few products that help my under eye area. Unfortunately those that do are VERY expensive. As such, I wanted for this to work, so badly.  I didn't notice any immediate results.  Sadly, I also didn't notice much difference after using it for some time. It seems to moisturize nicely, so there is that.  However, I was really hoping it would help do more than just that. In looking at the photos, it does seem to have made some difference, but not as substantial as I would have thought. (Before is the top photo)
faceoff_negative.headline: I wanted so bad to like this
